meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by hypercalcemia.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the hypercalcemic patient had high levels of calcium in their blood.
meanings.sent2: The hypercalcemic condition can lead to various health issues.
meanings.sent3: The hypercalcemic cat refused to drink milk, fearing it would make the calcium levels even higher.
meanings.sent4: Her hypercalcemic smile was as bright as the excess calcium in her blood.
meanings.sent5: The hypercalcemic glow of the night sky was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Characterized by an excess of calcium in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The hypercalcemic patient needed treatment to lower their blood calcium levels.
meanings.sent2: It is important to monitor the hypercalcemic condition to prevent complications.
meanings.sent3: The hypercalcemic milkshake was so thick, it could almost be mistaken for a calcium supplement.
meanings.sent4: Her hypercalcemic laughter echoed through the room, full of excess joy.
meanings.sent5: The hypercalcemic river flowed with a shimmering white hue.
